subject: Horse Racing
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
Breeders' Cup (Horse Races)
lead_paragraph: Baffert said he was disappointed but satisfied with his colt’s gritty performance on Saturday and made it clear that he wanted him to race one last time, in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
snippet: Baffert said he was disappointed but satisfied with his colt’s gritty performance on Saturday and made it clear that he wanted him to race one last time, in the Breeders’ Cup Classic.
